de.adorsys.android.securestoragelibrary

Class SecurePreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.adorsys.android.securestoragelibrary.SecurePreferences

  • public final class SecurePreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles every use case for the developer using Secure Storage. Encryption, Decryption, Storage, Removal etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void clearAllValues(android.content.Context context)
      Clears all values from the SecureStorage on the Android Device and deletes the en/decryption keys Means new keys/keypairs have to be generated for the library to be able to work
      static boolean contains(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String key)
      Checks if SecureStorage contains a value for the given key (Does not return the value or check what type it is)
      static boolean getBooleanValue(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String key, boolean defValue)
      Gets encrypted boolean value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it
      static float getFloatValue(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String key, float defValue)
      Gets encrypted float value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it
      static int getIntValue(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String key, int defValue)
      Gets encrypted int value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it
      static long getLongValue(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String key, long defValue)
      Gets encrypted long value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it
      static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getStringSetValue(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String key, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> defValue)
      Gets encrypted int value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it
      static java.lang.String getStringValue(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String defValue)
      Gets encrypted String value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it
      static void registerOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener(android.content.Context context, android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener listener)
      Registers SecureStorageChangeListener to listen to any changes in SecureStorage
      static void removeValue(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String key)
      Removes the value for a given key from SecureStorage

      Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device

      Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device
      static void setValue(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String key, int value)
      Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device

      Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device

      Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device

    • Method Detail

      • setValue

        public static void setValue(@NonNull
                            android.content.Context context,
                            @NonNull
                            java.lang.String key,
                            @NonNull
                            java.lang.String value)
                     throws SecureStorageException
        Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device
        Parameters:
        context - Context is used internally
        key - Key used to identify the stored value in SecureStorage
        value - Plain String value that will be encrypted and stored in the SecureStorage
        Throws:
        SecureStorageException

                            android.content.Context context,
                            @NonNull
                            java.lang.String key,
                            @NonNull
                            java.util.Set<java.lang.String> value)
                     throws SecureStorageException

      • getStringValue

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String getStringValue(@NonNull
                                                        android.content.Context context,
                                                        @NonNull
                                                        java.lang.String key,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        java.lang.String defValue)
        Gets encrypted String value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it
        Parameters:
        context - Context is used internally
        key - Key used to identify the stored value in SecureStorage
        defValue - Default String value that will be returned if the value with given key doesn't exist or an exception is thrown
        Returns:
        Decrypted String value associated with given key from SecureStorage

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(@NonNull
                               android.content.Context context,
                               @NonNull
                               java.lang.String key)
        Checks if SecureStorage contains a value for the given key (Does not return the value or check what type it is)
        Parameters:
        context - Context is used internally
        key - Key used to identify the stored value in SecureStorage
        Returns:
        True if value exists in SecureStorage, otherwise false

      • clearAllValues

        public static void clearAllValues(@NonNull
                                  android.content.Context context)
                           throws SecureStorageException
        Clears all values from the SecureStorage on the Android Device and deletes the en/decryption keys Means new keys/keypairs have to be generated for the library to be able to work
        Parameters:
        context - Context is used internally
        Throws:
        SecureStorageException

      • registerOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener

        public static void registerOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener(@NonNull
                                                            android.content.Context context,
                                                            @NonNull
                                                            android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener listener)
        Registers SecureStorageChangeListener to listen to any changes in SecureStorage
        Parameters:
        context - Context is used internally
        listener - Provided listener with given behaviour from the developer that will be registered

      • unregisterOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener

        public static void unregisterOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener(@NonNull
                                                              android.content.Context context,
                                                              @NonNull
                                                              android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener listener)
        Unregisters SecureStorageChangeListener from SecureStorage
        Parameters:
        context - Context is used internally
        listener - Provided listener with given behaviour from the developer that will be unregistered
